# SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0

# Data Packet Format:
#
#  * aabbccdd uu
#
#   where
#      '*' indicates that tlast should be asserted,
#      aabbccdd is the data, and
#      uu is the tuser.
#
# Notes:
#   - tuser and '*' are optional
#   - '*' (the eop character) can appear anywhere on the line.
#   - Comments begin with '#' and can start anywhere on the line
#   - Extra whitespace doesn't matter
#   - Commas get replaced with spaces
#
# Bit 7 of user indicates that this is a tag.
# Bit 6-0 are the tag types.

  1020304010203040 e0
  1121314111213141 e1
  1222324212223242
  1323334313233343
  AA00000000000000
  00AA000000000000
  0000AA0000000000
  000000AA00000000
  00000000AA000000
  0000000000AA0000
  000000000000AA00
  00000000000000AA
  000000000000AAAA
  0000000000AAAAAA
  00000000AAAAAAAA
  000000AAAAAAAAAA
  0000AAAAAAAAAAAA
  00AAAAAAAAAAAAAA
  AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
  1424344414243444
  1525354515253545
  1626364616263646
  1727374717273747
  1828384818283848
* 1929394919293949

  1020304010203040
  1121314111213141
  1222324212223242
  AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
  1323334313233343
  1424344414243444 7f
  1525354515253545
  1626364616263646 a2
  1727374717273747
  AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
  1828384818283848
* 1929394919293949

  1020304010203040
  1121314111213141
  1222324212223242
  1323334313233343
  1424344414243444 81
  AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
  1525354515253545
  1626364616263646 a2
  1727374717273747
  1828384818283848
  1020304010203040
  1121314111213141
  1222324212223242
  1323334313233343
  1020304010203040
  1121314111213141
  1222324212223242
  1323334313233343
  1020304010203040
  1121314111213141
  AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
  1222324212223242
  1323334313233343
  1020304010203040
  1121314111213141
  1222324212223242
  1323334313233343
* 1929394919293949
